trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated" /> events of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating" /> 控制項的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs> class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> methods to provide access to the business object instance before any data operations that are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and business object are performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>類別用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A>方法，以提供存取權之前使用的任何資料作業的商務物件執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制和商務物件會執行。

trans-unit.source: The business object is set and accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定商務物件，而且使用存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating> event, you can create an instance of the business object in custom code instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> performing the instantiation.
trans-unit.target: 加入事件處理常式委派以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating>事件，您可以在自訂程式碼，而不是建立商務物件的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>執行具現化。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want a non-default instance of your business object or to call a non-default constructor to create the instance; the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> always calls the default constructor to create an instance of the business object it works with.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要撥打的非預設建構函式來建立執行個體; 或商務物件的非預設執行個體時這非常有用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>一律會呼叫預設建構函式來建立它所使用的商務物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can also add an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated> event, which enables you to access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any additional initialization or work.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入事件處理常式委派以處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>事件，可讓您可公開存取任何公開的商務物件的成員執行任何額外的初始化或工作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> methods are not called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, if the business object method that performs the data operations is `static`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A>不會呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制，如果是商務物件方法，以執行資料作業`static`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項不僅會公開許多您可以控制它們來使用基礎的商務物件在其生命週期中的不同時間的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的事件，以及相關聯<xref:System.EventArgs>類別和事件處理常式委派。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: EventArgs
trans-unit.target: EventArgs

trans-unit.source: EventHandler
trans-unit.target: EventHandler

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前建立的商務物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.
trans-unit.target: 在建立商務物件的執行個體之後，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料之前發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>。

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Insert、 update 或 delete 作業執行之前發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之後擷取的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 插入、 更新或刪除作業已完成之後發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 在商務物件被終結之前發生。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to retrieve and display information.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的商務物件的控制和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>擷取及顯示資訊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides the example basic business object that the first code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例使用範例基本商務物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to retrieve and display information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的商務物件的控制和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>擷取及顯示資訊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible nor appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，如同許多真實世界案例中，它可能不可能也不適合使用具有的商務物件的預設執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>成功無法呼叫預設建構函式，因為它將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the default constructor might be protected and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，可能會受保護的預設建構函式，並在其他它可能會初始化為所需狀態的商務物件。

trans-unit.source: Whatever the reason, you can create an instance of the business object yourself and set the instance to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs> object that is passed to the handler.
trans-unit.target: 不論原因，您可以自行建立商務物件的執行個體並將設定執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>傳遞至處理常式的物件。

trans-unit.source: This is the business object instance that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> will use to perform its work.
trans-unit.target: 這是商務物件的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>將用來執行其工作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範上述的程式碼範例會使用範例基本商務物件。

trans-unit.source: The business object with which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> interacts to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 會與其互動以執行資料作業的商務物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs" /> class using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的物件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the business object with which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control performs data operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 用來執行資料作業的商務物件。

trans-unit.source: The business object the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> uses to perform data operations; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if <see langword="null" /> is passed to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 用來執行資料作業的商務物件，如果將 <see langword="null" /> 傳遞至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs" /> 則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to retrieve and display information.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的商務物件的控制和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>擷取及顯示資訊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides the example basic business object that the first code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例使用範例基本商務物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to retrieve and display information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的商務物件的控制和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>擷取及顯示資訊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible nor appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，如同許多真實世界案例中，它可能不可能也不適合使用具有的商務物件的預設執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>成功無法呼叫預設建構函式，因為它將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the default constructor might be protected and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，可能會受保護的預設建構函式，並在其他它可能會初始化為所需狀態的商務物件。

trans-unit.source: Whatever the reason, you can create an instance of the business object yourself and set the instance to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs> object that is passed to the handler.
trans-unit.target: 不論原因，您可以自行建立商務物件的執行個體並將設定執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>傳遞至處理常式的物件。

trans-unit.source: This is the business object instance that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> will use to perform its work.
trans-unit.target: 這是商務物件的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>將用來執行其工作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範上述的程式碼範例會使用範例基本商務物件。
